tagline: Python port of windows bubbles application (http://bubbleshq.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### Gnome-bubbles
This python application lets you embed any webpage in a tiny desktop application appearing as a status icon.

Interaction between the webpage and the desktop can be made by javascript.

Configuration is made by creating bblbox files ([see wiki](https://github.com/melchips/gnome-bubbles/wiki/bblbox)).

### Authors and Contributors
Truphemus Francois (@melchips)
name: Gnome-bubbles
